overview: Sports & Fitness, Water Sports, Surfing & Boardsports, Women In Sports - From California to Costa Rica, Australia and Hawaii, this film documents the rise of women's longboard surfing over the last decade. More than 20 first-class lady longboarders -- including world champions Daize Shayne, Cori Schumacher, Kim Hamrock, Summer Romero and 2005 champ Kristy Murphy, as well as top pros Mary Osborne and Kassia Meador -- share the rides of their lives, demonstrating why wave-riding women are turning to longboards.
title: Ten Years of Women's Longboarding
